CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper December 29, 1951, pg. 13, reads: "Budding Artist - A Promising Art Student and Her Work... Bottom middle: One of Peggy's costumes for a South American musical, 'Hole-Pegge-e-e!'... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Full length portrait of Peggy Owens (Skillen) wearing short, off the shoulder dress with rows of ruffles and long train for musical
